insert.foreach: INSERT INTO BOOK (BOOK_ISBN ,BOOK_TITLE, BOOK_AUTHOR, BOOK_PUBLISHER, BOOK_PUBDATE, BOOK_DESCRIPTION, BOOK_IMAGE, BOOK_FIELD) VALUES (#{book.bookIsbn}, #{book.bookTitle}, #{book.bookAuthor}, #{book.bookPublisher}, #{book.bookPubdate}, #{book.bookDescription}, #{book.bookImage}, #{book.bookField})

mapper.select: SELECT A.BOOK_NO, A.BOOK_ISBN , A.BOOK_TITLE, A.BOOK_AUTHOR, A.BOOK_PUBLISHER, A.BOOK_PUBDATE, A.BOOK_DESCRIPTION, A.BOOK_IMAGE, A.BOOK_FIELD FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOOK_NO) AS RN, BOOK_NO, BOOK_ISBN ,BOOK_TITLE, BOOK_AUTHOR, BOOK_PUBLISHER, BOOK_PUBDATE, BOOK_DESCRIPTION, BOOK_IMAGE, BOOK_FIELD FROM BOOK)A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
SELECT COUNT(BOOK_TITLE) FROM BOOK WHERE ${column} LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'

SELECT A.BOOK_NO, A.BOOK_ISBN , A.BOOK_TITLE, A.BOOK_AUTHOR, A.BOOK_PUBLISHER, A.BOOK_PUBDATE, A.BOOK_DESCRIPTION, A.BOOK_IMAGE, A.BOOK_FIELD FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOOK_NO) AS RN, BOOK_NO, BOOK_ISBN ,BOOK_TITLE, BOOK_AUTHOR, BOOK_PUBLISHER, BOOK_PUBDATE, BOOK_DESCRIPTION, BOOK_IMAGE, BOOK_FIELD FROM BOOK WHERE ${column} LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%')A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}

SELECT B.BOOK_NO, B.BOOK_TITLE, B.BOOK_AUTHOR, B.BOOK_DESCRIPTION, B.BOOK_IMAGE, B.AVERAGE FROM (SELECT A.BOOK_NO, A.BOOK_TITLE, A.BOOK_AUTHOR, A.BOOK_DESCRIPTION, A.BOOK_IMAGE, A.AVERAGE FROM (SELECT B.BOOK_NO, B.BOOK_TITLE, B.BOOK_AUTHOR, B.BOOK_DESCRIPTION, B.BOOK_IMAGE, AVG(BR.BOOK_RATING) AS AVERAGE FROM BOOK B INNER JOIN BOOK_REPLY BR ON B.BOOK_NO = BR.BOOK_NO GROUP BY B.BOOK_NO, B.BOOK_TITLE, B.BOOK_AUTHOR, B.BOOK_DESCRIPTION, B.BOOK_IMAGE) A ORDER BY A.AVERAGE DESC) B WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
